concept.title: Vinebound Odyssey
concept.description: Embark on a vibrant jungle adventure as Pip, a nimble monkey, swinging through lush canopies and ancient ruins to rescue his wise monk friend, Master Lao. Navigate treacherous terrain, outsmart mischievous creatures, and uncover the secrets of the lost temple.
concept.theme: Serene yet adventurous jungle, ancient temples, spiritual journey
concept.objective: Find and rescue Master Lao, who has been captured by a shadowy force within the ruins of the Sunstone Temple.
mechanics: Vine Swinging: Player controls Pip's grip on vines, releasing to gain momentum and aiming for subsequent vines or ledges.  The swing physics will be satisfying and allow for skilled maneuvers.
Momentum-based platforming: Utilize collected momentum from swings to reach higher platforms, cross large gaps, and activate environmental elements.
Environmental Puzzles: Manipulate vines, levers, and other jungle elements to open new paths and overcome obstacles.
player_abilities: Vine Grab: Pip can automatically or manually latch onto vines within a certain range.
Double Jump: A standard double jump for quick adjustments in the air.
Ground Pound (Unlockable): After reaching a certain point, Pip can perform a ground pound to break weak floors or stun enemies.

enemies.name: Grubler
enemies.behavior: Slow-moving, ground-based creatures that try to bite Pip if he lands near them. They are easily avoided by swinging over them or jumping.

enemies.name: Spore Shooter
enemies.behavior: Stationary plants that periodically shoot slow-moving projectiles. Pip needs to time his swings or find cover to avoid them.

enemies.name: Shadow Stalker
enemies.behavior: Elusive, shadowy figures that emerge from darker areas. They will try to pounce on Pip if he lingers too long in their sight. Requires precise timing to dodge.

powerups.name: Guava Burst
powerups.effect: Temporarily increases Pip's swing speed and jump height, allowing for longer and faster traversal.

powerups.name: Spirit Leaf
powerups.effect: Grants Pip a temporary shield that absorbs one enemy hit.

concept.level_progression: Levels are interconnected zones within the jungle and temple. Players progress by finding new paths, solving puzzles, and defeating mini-bosses that guard key areas. New abilities or power-ups are often unlocked at the end of major sections, opening up previously inaccessible areas (Metroidvania-lite elements).
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for collecting golden bananas, completing levels quickly, finding hidden collectibles (like ancient relics), and defeating enemies. A multiplier is applied for seamless vine chains without touching the ground.
concept.visual_style: Hand-drawn 2D art with vibrant, lush jungle environments and detailed, ancient temple ruins.  Character designs are expressive and a bit cartoony, contrasting with the more mysterious aura of the temples.  Parallax scrolling for depth.  Emphasis on dynamic lighting, especially in darker temple areas.
concept.sound_theme: A blend of calming, ambient jungle sounds (birdsong, rustling leaves, flowing water) that transition into more adventurous and slightly mysterious melodies as Pip enters the ruins.  Satisfying 'whoosh' for vine swings and distinct sound cues for enemy attacks and power-ups.

level_design.name: Whispering Canopy
level_design.description: Begin your journey in the tranquil lower canopy, learning the basics of vine swinging and navigating the vibrant jungle. A few mischievous creatures have made their home here, so tread carefully.

theme: A game about a monkey that swings on vines to find his monk friend
